title: How to unsubscribe from Blue Apron
description: Blue Apron has moved away from a traditional subscription model, allowing you to order meals à la carte without a recurring commitment. However, if you have a Blue Apron+ membership or an Autoship & Save plan, you may want to cancel it. Here's how:

web.title: Cancel Blue Apron Subscription via Website
web.description:
To cancel your Blue Apron subscription via the website:

*   Sign in to your account on the Blue Apron website.
*   Go to Account → Blue Apron+ (or Autoship & Save).
*   Select "Cancel Membership" or "Cancel Plan".
*   Follow the on-screen prompts to complete the cancellation.
*   Ensure you cancel before the cutoff date for your next order, typically 6 to 7 days before your delivery day.

app.title: Cancel Blue Apron Subscription via Mobile App
app.description:
To cancel your Blue Apron subscription via the mobile app:

*   Sign in to your account on the Blue Apron mobile app.
*   Go to Account → Blue Apron+ (or Autoship & Save).
*   Select "Cancel Membership" or "Cancel Plan".
*   Follow the on-screen prompts to complete the cancellation.
*   Ensure you cancel before the cutoff date for your next order, typically 6 to 7 days before your delivery day.

email.title: Cancel Blue Apron Subscription via Email
email.description:
To cancel your Blue Apron subscription via email:

*   Send a cancellation request to cancellations@blueapron.com.
*   Ensure you cancel before the cutoff date for your next order, typically 6 to 7 days before your delivery day.

seo_text: Cancel your Blue Apron subscription easily by following these steps. Whether you have a Blue Apron+ membership or an Autoship & Save plan, you can cancel online or via email. Remember to cancel before the cutoff date to avoid being charged for the next order.
